easy.title: Check Whether a Number is Prime
easy.problem: Given an integer N, determine whether it is a prime number.
easy.approach: Check divisibility from 2 to square root of N.

easy.title: Count Digits in a Number
easy.problem: Given a number N, count the total number of digits.

easy.title: Find Sum of Elements in an Array
easy.problem: Find the sum of all elements in an array.

medium.title: Reverse Words in a String
medium.problem: Reverse the order of words in a string.
medium.approach: Split string by spaces and reverse word order.

medium.title: Find Second Smallest Element
medium.problem: Find the second smallest distinct element in an array.
medium.approach: Track smallest and second smallest values.

medium.title: Check if Two Strings are Anagrams
medium.problem: Check whether two strings are anagrams.

hard.title: Longest Common Prefix
hard.problem: Find the longest common prefix among an array of strings.

hard.title: Detect Cycle in Linked List
hard.problem: Detect whether a linked list contains a cycle.

hard.title: Find Missing and Repeating Number
hard.problem: One number is missing and one is repeating in array from 1 to N.

hard.title: Merge Two Sorted Linked Lists
hard.problem: Merge two sorted linked lists into one sorted list.
hard.approach: Compare nodes and link the smaller node.
